addEventFilters

void addEventFilters(java.lang.String[] eventList)
                     throws RPProxyException
Adds the specified eventtypes to the list of eventtypes currently associated with this DataSelector. Only events of the types that have been added shall be reported.

Parameters:
eventList - A list of event types to add

RPProxyException
